error_details.explanation: Incorrect operand. The variable 'main_job_hours_per_day' (value: 8) was used instead of 'main_job_daily_earnings' (value: 128.0).

context.question: N/A
context.flawed_solution:
#### 175
She works 8 hours a day at $16 an hour so she makes 8*16 = $<<8*16=128>>128 a day
She works this job 5 days a week so she makes 8*5 = $<<8*5=40>>40 in 5 days
She works 2 hours a day at $13.5 an hour so she makes 2*13.5 = $<<2*13.5=27>>27 a day
She works this job 5 days a week so she makes 27*5 = $<<27*5=135>>135
She makes $40 at her main job and $135 at her part-time job so all total she makes 40+135 = $<<40+135=175>>175 in 5 days
